page.title: 04CRADLEY NATURE DIARY-WINTER
page.content: {January}4th Pool frozen over with thick ice.8th.Snow yesterday,more snow today.JAN. 11th saw pied wagtail in playground.22nd.Lambs born at Church Farm.Lapwings seen on the way to Ledbury.23rd Fields on way to Ledbury flooded with melting snow. 29th.Cold but some plants coming up.31st.Lamb born in nearby field,owner has 60-70 lambs. {February}5th.Snowdrops out in garden. 11th.Snowed until lunch time the next day.Snowdrifts looked like caves. 15th.Black cap on bird table. Icicles on flood gates.26th.Bulbs coming out. {March}7th.Crocuses coming out. 11th.Blackbirds nesting.12th.Very frosty but sunny.25th.found acorns which have started to grow.26th Primroses on the Nature table.
